main event: An unidentified object was observed near Incirlik Air Force Base, Turkey, on December 15, 1958.
interesting points: The object appeared as a light about a mile away, changing colors from red to blue to white,The object moved in an erratic manner and seemed controlled,It disappeared before others could reach the scene,Observers were unable to determine the exact nature of the object due to its movement,No photographs or recordings were obtained.
sighted object: a light changing colors in the sky
witness description: observers at the Incirlik Air Base
